====== Vendor Accounts ======

== IBM ( AIX/PowerVM) ==

  * [[http://www.ibm.com/support||IBM Support]]
  * [[http://www.ibm.com/servers/eserver/ess/||Entitled Software downloads - you can download AIX DVDs from here]]
  * [[http://www.ibm.com/support/fixcentral/||Entitled Software - Patches - you can download TLs and SPs, firmware etc]]
    * Username : kkoroth@tenneco.com  **You may setup an account for yourselves and register the following customer ids to it. **
    * Password : abcd12345
    * Customer Number US        :        0760643
    * Customer Number US        :        8761982
    * Customer Number Germany   :        0371955
    * Customer Number Belgium   :        0032347
    * Customer Number EU        :        32347
